Function Summary
  get_calendar_for_month(year, month)

  get_previous_year_and_month(year, month)
  monthcalendar(year, month, firstweekday)
Return a matrix representing a month's calendar.
  write_month_to_document(doc, root, year, month)

Function Details

monthcalendar(year, month, firstweekday=0) 

Return a matrix representing a month's calendar.
Each row represents a week; days outside this month are zero.
